messages.title: THERESA MAY STRONG, STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: Theresa May's leadership emphasized as strong and stable in the national interest.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The leaflet emphasizes delivering Brexit with a focus on the national interest, includes plans outlined by Theresa May for a smooth Brexit and building a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard.
The candidate promises to bring better transport links and new homes, improve infrastructure and create new businesses, jobs, and economic growth.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet presents a tactical situation by comparing the leadership of Theresa May versus that of Jeremy Corbyn, suggesting the risk of economic chaos under Corbyn.

issues.brexitEurope: Huw Merriman supports Theresa May's plan to deliver Brexit and a new Britain outside the EU.
issues.economy: Emphasis on a strong economy rewarding hard work, with specific reference to delivering better transport links, new homes, and business opportunities.
issues.education: Plans for a new college in Bexhill and to deliver a better A21, suggesting improvements in education infrastructure.
issues.health: Building a stronger NHS is mentioned as part of building a stronger economy.

housing.content: Promises to build new homes and improve infrastructure.

politicalExperience.achievements: Defending interests in Parliament, delivering better transport links, new homes, infrastructure and jobs.

images.caption: Images of Huw Merriman with Theresa May, interacting with the community and emphasizing collaboration with the Prime Minister.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contrasts the Conservative leadership with that of Labour's Jeremy Corbyn, indicating the importance of voting for stability and against the perceived risk of 'economic chaos'.
